name: IBMMobileFirstPlatformFoundationOpenSSLUtils
license: IBM - MobileFirst Platform Foundation 8.0 license agreement
summary: Use the SDK as addition to IBMMobileFirstPlatformFoundation if you want Open SSL
description:
The IBM MobileFirst platform for iOS SDK integrates with 
                       the IBM MobileFirst platform Cloud Services. The SDK has a modular design, 
                       so you can add add services that are required by your 
                       application as needed.
